overview_of_class: This course will cover a variety of topics associated with the thermodynamics and kinetics of phase transformations in materials. Topics to be covered include the various theories of nucleation, spinodal decomposition, grain growth, coarsening, order-disorder transformations, precipitation, and solidification.
name: Phase Transformations in Materials
title: MEAS MAT_SCI 408-0-20 Phase Transformations in Materials
